content: Can anyone update me on the current status of this PR? I noticed that the last comment on this PR was from 3 weeks ago, and it has been inactive since then. How will we proceed on this? @Andrew Yang @Raphael Douglas Giles @Christian Merten

Just to expand on this, this comment at the bottom of the thread on #22127 is basically what's happening (i.e. instead of using all this RelSeries business which will require some refactoring of the RelSeries API to make mathlib ready, we'll use Andrew's approach of using Jordan Holder directly). So we need #21803 as part of Andrew's approach to the module length API
